document.full_text: nehro, the runner-up to animal kingdom in the kentucky derby, will not run in the preakness stakes on saturday and be pointed instead to the belmont stakes on june 11.
document.title: the rail: nehro will skip the preakness
lines_and_colors: nehro, the runner-up to animal kingdom in the kentucky derby, will not run in the preakness stakes on saturday and be pointed instead to the belmont stakes on june 11.
